oneOf.description: URI to a resource containing retry definitions (json or yaml)
Workflow Retry definitions. Define retry strategies that can be referenced in states onError definitions

delay.description: Time delay between retry attempts (ISO 8601 duration format)

maxDelay.description: Maximum time delay between retry attempts (ISO 8601 duration format)

increment.description: Static value by which the delay increases during each attempt (ISO 8601 time format)

multiplier.description: Numeric value, if specified the delay between retries is multiplied by this value.

jitter.description: If float type, maximum amount of random time added or subtracted from the delay between each retry relative to total delay (between 0 and 1). If string type, absolute maximum amount of random time added or subtracted from the delay between each retry (ISO 8601 duration format)
